name: Evey's Game Protos
description:
4 games made for a college class, they're like proof of concept games and none of them might be turned into real games. But, enjoy them! :)

Note: Only Fay's Feat has sound and it's only sound effects and no music. Also, every game has info and credits in their F1 screens so read those!

Everything in the games (unless stated otherwise in their credits) was made by me.

EDIT (9/10/16): Ported all games to GMX so they could be watermark-free! They're pretty much the same from the old versions.
